title: Viad Corp Declares Quarterly Dividend
text:
PHOENIX--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The board of directors of Viad Corp (NYSE:VVI) declared a quarterly dividend of $0.10 per share on the common stock of Viad. The dividend is payable April 2, 2018, to stockholders of record on March 16, 2018.
About Viad
Viad (NYSE: VVI) generates revenue and shareholder value through its two business units: GES and Pursuit. GES is a global, full-service live events company offering a comprehensive range of services to the world's leading brands and event organizers. Pursuit is a collection of inspiring and unforgettable travel experiences in Alaska, Glacier National Park, Banff, Jasper and Vancouver that includes attractions, lodges and hotels, and sightseeing tours that connect guests with iconic places. Viad is an S&P SmallCap 600 company. For more information, visit the company's Website at www.viad.com .
